column1:

Universal Variable Specification
column2:
Variables output on every page are based on

column1:
Click 'Embed' button in OpenTag interface for the container you'd like to implement.
Your container ID should look like 1234-56789, for example:
<script src="//d3c3cq33003psk.cloudfront.net/opentag-1234-56789.js" async defer></script>
You can Sign In or Signup for an OpenTag account.
column2:
Click 'Embed' button in OpenTag interface for the container you'd like to implement.
Your container ID should look like 1234-56789, for example:
<script src="//d3c3cq33003psk.cloudfront.net/opentag-1234-56789.js" async defer></script>
You can Sign In or Signup for an OpenTag account.

column1: Show the real, numerical ID of the product. If set to no, it will use the SKU. Recommended value: No
column2: Show the real, numerical ID of the product. If set to no, it will use the SKU. Recommended value: No

column1: If set to yes, it will show the stock product qty
column2: If set to yes, it will show the stock product qty

column1: Show the real, numerical ID of the user. If set to no, it will use a hash. Recommended value: No
column2: Show the real, numerical ID of the user. If set to no, it will use a hash. Recommended value: No

column1: Product list block name on category pages
column2: Product list block name on category pages

column1: The name of the catalog/product_list block on category pages. Default value: product_list
column2: The name of the catalog/product_list block on category pages. Default value: product_list

column1: Product list block name on search result pages

column2: The name of the catalog/product_list block on search result pages. Default value: search_result_list
